page.title: 19Life Style
page.content: On Monday our class went to do a survey on the shops on Upton Road with Mr Brookbank our teacher.The first shop came to was B Cottam which is a Grocers and Off Licence which is across the road from our school.Facing it is a shop called the Avon.It sells sweets,daily papers and it is a tabacconist.A bit further on is a shop called P.M.C. a man came out of the shop and told us that P.M.C. stood for Peter,Michael and Christopher.Next door is ashop called Kids Stuff which sells childrens wear.The next shop along is Icelandwhich sells mainly frozen foods,my mum works there.Next along is Alan Paul a hairdressers.Then was Shetly Fashions which sells ladies clothes.Next along was Fosters the green grocers.Dewhurst the Butchers, Sayers the cakes,Time Spot the watch menders and jewellery.....
